member.name: M:NotesAPI.Controllers.CategoryController.GetAllCategories
member.summary: Gets the whole list of categories

member.name: M:NotesAPI.Controllers.CategoryController.GetCategories(System.String)
member.summary: Gets only the categories with a certain ID

member.name: M:NotesAPI.Controllers.CategoryController.AddCategories(NotesAPI.Models.Category)
member.summary: Adds a new category to the categories list

member.name: M:NotesAPI.Controllers.CategoryController.RemoveCategories(System.String)
member.summary: Will delete all the categories with a specified ID

member.name: M:NotesAPI.Controllers.NotesController.GetNotesByOwner(System.Guid)
member.summary: Get all notes of a certain owner

member.name: M:NotesAPI.Controllers.NotesController.GetNotesID(System.Guid)
member.summary: Get all notes with a certain ID

member.name: M:NotesAPI.Controllers.NotesController.UpdateNote(System.Guid,NotesAPI.Models.Note)
member.summary: Updates the note with a certain ID

member.name: M:NotesAPI.Controllers.NotesController.DeleteNote(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes the note with that certain ID

member.name: M:NotesAPI.Controllers.NotesController.UpdateNoteAdvanced(System.Guid,System.Guid,NotesAPI.Models.Note)
member.summary: Updates the note with a certain ID, of a certain owner's ID. Owner's ID comes first, than the note's.

member.name: M:NotesAPI.Controllers.NotesController.DeleteNoteAdvanced(System.Guid,System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes a note with the input ID, of a certain owner's ID. Owner's ID comes first, than the note's.

member.name: M:NotesAPI.Controllers.NotesController.DeleteAllNotesOfOwner(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes all notes of an owner

member.name: M:NotesAPI.Controllers.OwnerController.AddOwner(NotesAPI.Models.Owner)
member.summary: Adds a new owner to the owner list

member.name: M:NotesAPI.Controllers.OwnerController.UpdateOwner(System.Guid,NotesAPI.Models.Owner)
member.summary: Updates an owner with a certain ID

member.name: M:NotesAPI.Controllers.OwnerController.RemoveOwner(System.Guid)
member.summary: Delets the owner with the specified ID
